title: Evientually
description: At 24, Evie decides that enough is enough and that it is time to come out and begin her transition.This jumbled mess of a book, by an incompetent first-time trans author, looks at the first year of her medical and emotional journey towards self-acceptance and happiness as well as finally completing her studies while appeasing her parents and exploring her sexual desires.Adults only, due to sexual content, coarse language, transphobia and some alcohol.
author: Paige Helmetts
